mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, A.DIAG_DATE TIME,B.DICT_NAME NAME FROM TBL_PSON_DISEASES_HT A, P_DICTIONARY B WHERE a.DIESEASE_TYPE_CODE = b.DICT_CODE AND b.DICTTYPE_ID ='129675B8527540C6905259915B242A2A' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DIAG_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT * FROM (SELECT OPERAT_TIME TIME,OPERAT_HISTORY NAME FROM TBL_PSON_OPERATION_HT WHERE EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY OPERAT_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT * FROM (SELECT RTRM_OCCR_TIME TIME, RTUM_NAME NAME FROM TBL_PSON_RTUM_HT WHERE EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY RTRM_OCCR_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT * FROM (SELECT TRANSFUSION_TIME TIME, TRANSFUSION_CAUSE NAME FROM TBL_PSON_TRANSFUSION_HT WHERE EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY TRANSFUSION_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT GENETIC_HISTORY_DESC FROM TBL_PSON_GENETIC_HT WHERE EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DOC_NO = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT P1.DICT_NAME SPORT_FREQ, P2.DICT_NAME DIET_CUSTOM, P3.DICT_NAME SMOKE_STATUS, OCCUPA_HAZARDOUS_DESC, OCCUPA_HAZARDOUS_ST FROM TBL_HC_LIFESTYLE A, P_DICTIONARY P1, P_DICTIONARY P2, P_DICTIONARY P3 WHERE A.SPORT_FREQ_CODE = P1.DICT_CODE AND P1.DICTTYPE_ID='B36AFAA56AC84C33BF890B2AAE00BD75' AND A.DIET_CUSTOM_CODE = P2.DICT_CODE AND P2.DICTTYPE_ID='4F3BFCBEC3624F23BABB6CA5B3DDFFB6' AND A.SMOKE_STATUS_CODE = P3.DICT_CODE AND P3.DICTTYPE_ID='A777187BBF0F4D099E52ED0D42F19558' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.RPT_TIME,A.EXAM_ITEM_NAME,C.DICT_NAME IMAGE_FINDING,B.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG FROM TBL_IMAGE_EXAM A, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN B, P_DICTIONARY C WHERE A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = B.MD_CODE AND A.ISMASCULINE = C.DICT_CODE AND EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = 'B3176437815F40AE853DDC30E7620439' ORDER BY RPT_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.OUTPATIENT_TIME,C.MD_NAME DISEASE_DIAG, D.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG,E.DICT_NAME CLINIC_DEPT FROM TBL_OUTPATIENT_DIAG B, MD_ICD_10 C, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN D, P_DICTIONARY E WHERE B.MAIN_DISEASE_DIAG_CODE = C.MD_CODE AND B.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = D.MD_CODE AND B.CLINIC_DEPT_CODE = E.DICT_CODE AND E.DICTTYPE_ID='DF38A949C56743F99D6667C39CD88182' AND B.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B.OUTPATIENT_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.INSPECT_DATE,A.INSPECT_ITEM_NAME,D.REMARK INSPECT_RPT_RESULT,B.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG FROM TBL_INSEPECT_REPORT A, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN B, TBL_INSPECT_REPORT_DETAIL C, P_DICTIONARY D WHERE A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = B.MD_CODE AND A.INSPECT_RPT_NO = C.INSPECT_RPT_NO AND C.ABNORMAL_PROMPT = D.DICT_CODE AND D.DICTTYPE_ID = 'B9202D6AA1314FE68513895C490D3716' AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY INSPECT_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.INHOS_TIME,C.MD_NAME INHOS_DIAG, D.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG, E.DICT_NAME INHOS_DEPT FROM TBL_INHOSPITAL_REG A, TBL_INHOSPITAL_REG_DIAG B, MD_ICD_10 C, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN D, P_DICTIONARY E WHERE A.INHOSPITAL_SN = B.INHOSPITAL_SN AND C.MD_CODE = B.INHOS_DIAG_CODE AND A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = D.MD_CODE AND A.INHOS_DEPT_CODE = E.DICT_CODE AND E.DICTTYPE_ID='DF38A949C56743F99D6667C39CD88182' AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY INHOS_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT FU_VISIT_DATE, C.MD_NAME FU_DOCTOR, B.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG FROM TBL_HBP_FOLLOWUP A, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN B,BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN_STAFF C WHERE A.FU_DOCTOR_CODE = C.MD_CODE AND A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = B.MD_CODE AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT FU_VISIT_DATE, C.MD_NAME FU_DOCTOR, B.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG FROM TBL_DM_FOLLOWUP A, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN B, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN_STAFF C WHERE A.FU_DOCTOR_CODE = C.MD_CODE AND A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = B.MD_CODE AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT FU_VISIT_DATE, C.MD_NAME FU_DOCTOR, B.MD_NAME SERVICE_ORG FROM TBL_ELDERFU A, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN B, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN_STAFF C WHERE A.FU_DOCTOR_CODE = C.MD_CODE AND A.SERVICE_ORG_CODE = B.MD_CODE AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY FU_VISIT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.FU_VISIT_DATE, B.SBP, B.DBP FROM TBL_HBP_FOLLOWUP A, TBL_HBPFU_SIGN B WHERE A.HBPCARD_NO = B.HBPCARD_NO AND A.HBP_FU_NO = B.HBP_FU_NO AND A.FU_VISIT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MONTH')),'YYYYMMDD') AND A.FU_VISIT_DATE >=TO_CHAR (ADD_MONTHS (TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MONTH'), -11), 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.FU_VISIT_DATE DESC

SELECT FU_VISIT_DATE, FBG FROM TBL_DM_FOLLOWUP WHERE FU_VISIT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MONTH')),'YYYYMMDD') AND FU_VISIT_DATE >=TO_CHAR (ADD_MONTHS (TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MONTH'), -11), 'YYYYMMDD') AND EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY FU_VISIT_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT OUTPATIENT_TIME LATEST_DT, OUTPATIENT_SN SINGLE_NO FROM TBL_OUTPATIENT_DIAG WHERE EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY OUTPATIENT_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT INHOS_TIME LATEST_DT, INHOSPITAL_SN SINGLE_NO FROM TBL_INHOSPITAL_REG WHERE EMPI_NO= #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY INHOS_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT '长期' CATEGORY, A.FU_VISIT_DATE DT,B.DRUG_NAME,B.DRUG_OP_FREQ || ',一次' || B.DRUG_OP_SINGLE_DOSE || DRUG_OP_DOSE_UNIT DRUG_USAGE, C.DICT_NAME DRUG_OP_PATH FROM TBL_HBP_FOLLOWUP A, TBL_HBPFU_MEDICATIONS B, P_DICTIONARY C WHERE A.HBPCARD_NO = B.HBPCARD_NO AND A.HBP_FU_NO = B.HBP_FU_NO AND B.DURG_OP_PATH_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '4F66629BA4504B4E8F821136EF5D5DBF' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.FU_VISIT_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT '长期' CATEGORY, A.FU_VISIT_DATE DT,B.DRUG_NAME,B.DRUG_OP_FREQ || ',一次' || B.DRUG_OP_SINGLE_DOSE || DRUG_OP_DOSE_UNIT DRUG_USAGE, C.DICT_NAME DRUG_OP_PATH FROM TBL_DM_FOLLOWUP A, TBL_DMFU_MEDICATIONS B, P_DICTIONARY C WHERE A.DM_FU_NO = B.DM_FU_NO AND B.DURG_OP_PATH_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '4F66629BA4504B4E8F821136EF5D5DBF' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.FU_VISIT_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT '长期' CATEGORY, A.FU_VISIT_DATE DT,B.DRUG_NAME,B.DRUG_OP_FREQ || ',一次' || B.DRUG_OP_SINGLE_DOSE || DRUG_OP_DOSE_UNIT DRUG_USAGE, C.DICT_NAME DRUG_OP_PATH FROM TBL_ELDERFU A, TBL_ELDERFU_MEDICATIONS B, P_DICTIONARY C WHERE A.ELDERFU_NO = B.ELDERFU_NO AND B.DURG_OP_PATH_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '4F66629BA4504B4E8F821136EF5D5DBF' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.FU_VISIT_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT B.DICT_NAME ABO_TYPE, C.DICT_NAME RH_TYPE, D.GENETIC_HISTORY_DESC GENETIC_HISTORY FROM TBL_PSON_HEALTH_RECORD A, P_DICTIONARY B, P_DICTIONARY C, TBL_PSON_GENETIC_HT D WHERE A.HR_NO = D.HR_NO AND A.ABO_TYPE_CODE = B.DICT_CODE AND B.DICTTYPE_ID = '0AEED2AB24C34A56B5163F6F9F8EF585' AND A.RH_TYPE_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '88ABA94848F1449CB56F7501583E7CAB' AND A.EMPI_NO = #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DOC_NO = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
